description.title: New Js Bundler
description.details: Now using `esbuild` to build the Fabric Operations console. This allowed us to remove many out-of-date dev dependencies.

description.title: Fixed appending orderer
description.details: Fixed the appending orderer to cluster flow when using an OS without a system channel.

description.title: Fixed OSN Admin Features
description.details: More fixes for the new OSN Admin Features that use Fabric's "channel participation" apis.

description.title: Bug & security fixes
description.details: Miscellaneous fixes & dependency updates.

description.title: Fixed OSN Admin Features
description.details: Several fixes for the new OSN Admin Features that use Fabric's "channel participation" apis.

description.title: Removed auto restart on admin_certs change
description.details: Removed the automatic restart initiated by the console when editing a component's `admin_certs` field. The restart is handled by operator instead.

description.title: Bug & security fixes
description.details: Miscellaneous fixes & dependency updates.

description.title: Enabled OSN Admin Features
description.details: Several features that use Fabric's "channel participation" apis has been added. Such as the ability to join/un-join orderers to application channels. Requires Fabric v2.4+.

description.title: Enabled system channel removal flows
description.details: The ability to remove a system channel from an orderer has been added.

description.title: Create Orderer Changes
description.details: The ability to choose between creating an orderer with a system channel or without one has been added. Requires Fabric v2.4+ & a configured deployer.

description.title: Bug & security fixes
description.details: Miscellaneous fixes & dependency updates.

description.title: Bug & security fixes
description.details: Miscellaneous fixes & dependency updates.

description.title: Fixed remove consenter bug
description.details: Fixed bug where a consenter could not be removed from a channel because the MSP to use was not selectable.

description.title: Added restart progress
description.details: A progress bar will now appear when a user changes console settings and the console's server is restarting.

description.title: Support UTF8
description.details: Added support for decoding UTF8 text found in chaincode inputs and outputs (read/write sets).

description.title: Bug & security fixes
description.details: Miscellaneous fixes & dependency updates.

description.title: Bug fix - api validation
description.details: The hostname safe list is now rebuilt prior to validating the `cahost` field during component creation or update.

description.title: Node v16
description.details: Updated NodeJS to version 16.

description.title: Bug & security fixes
description.details: Miscellaneous fixes & dependency updates.

description.title: Bug & security fixes
description.details: Miscellaneous fixes & dependency updates.

description.title: Bug & security fixes
description.details: Miscellaneous fixes & dependency updates.

description.title: New Password Rules
description.details: New login passwords must pass OWASP strength tests. [Passwords <= 9 char] not allowed. [Passwords >= 10 && < 20 char] - must have lowercase & uppercase & special characters. [Passwords >= 20 char] - no extra rules.

description.title: Lower Component Limit
description.details: The maximum component limit has been lowered from 250 components to 75. This restriction applies to the total number of peers + orderers + CAs on 1 console.

description.title: Bug & security fixes
description.details: Miscellaneous fixes & dependency updates.

description.title: Fix MSP Role Builder
description.details: Fixes the 'MSPRole' field building inside a chaincode definition 'validationParameter' field when a value other than 'MEMBER' is set.

description.title: Fix Endorsement Policy Builder
description.details: Fixes the 'endorsementPolicy' field building inside a chaincode definition 'StaticCollectionConfig' field when an endorsement policy was not set.

description.title: Bug & security fixes
description.details: Miscellaneous fixes & dependency updates.

description.title: Prep work for OSNAdmin
description.details: Partial code for the OSN admin endpoint has been added, nothing related to osnadmin is useable.

description.title: Bug & security fixes
description.details: Miscellaneous fixes & dependency updates.

description.title: Bug & security fixes
description.details: Miscellaneous fixes & dependency updates.

description.title: Bug & security fixes
description.details: Miscellaneous fixes & dependency updates.

description.title: Bug fixes
description.details: Miscellaneous fixes.

description.title: Bug & security fixes
description.details: Miscellaneous fixes & dependency updates.

description.title: Added read-only-mode
description.details: Added a new setting that can be used to put the console in a read-only-mode.

description.title: Fix backup api
description.details: Prevented backup api database conflicts.

description.title: Bug & security fixes
description.details: Miscellaneous fixes & dependency updates.

description.title: Default password
description.details: Added a setting to allow users to keep the default password.

description.title: Fix max component limit
description.details: The max component limit was counting incorrectly.

description.title: Bug & security fixes
description.details: Miscellaneous fixes & dependency updates.

description.title: Bug & security fixes
description.details: Miscellaneous fixes & dependency updates.

description.title: Fixed import bug
description.details: Fixed bug that was preventing component importing.

description.title: Fixed component tile bug
description.details: Fixed issue where new component tiles would temporarily disappear until browser refresh.

description.title: Bug & security fixes
description.details: Miscellaneous fixes & dependency updates.

description.title: Bug fixes
description.details: Updated Certificate Authority (CA) patch to 1.5.2-1, Peer and ordering node patch to 1.4.12-3, 2.2.4-2. Miscellaneous bug fixes and security patches.

description.title: Initial release
description.details: Initial release for IBM Support for Hyperledger Fabric 1.0.0.
